{"step_by_step_thinking": "The EuroQol 5-Dimension Health Assessment (EQ-5D) is a widely used instrument that measures health-related quality of life (HRQoL) in chronic disease. It consists of five dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activities, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has three levels: no problems, some problems, and extreme problems. Therefore, the EQ-5D is a 5 question assessment with each question corresponding to one of the five dimensions.", "answer_choice": "A. yes"}
